perturbation.original_text: The terms of this agreement will remain confidential between CELEBRITY and the COMPANY unless written permission is granted for release by both parties.
perturbation.changed_text: The terms of this agreement regarding celebrity appearances will remain confidential between CELEBRITY and the COMPANY unless written permission is granted for release by both parties.
perturbation.explanation: Limiting confidentiality to only celebrity appearances when it was supposed to apply to all the terms of the agreement reduces its enforceability and introduces ambiguity. While some confidentiality is maintained, its scope is narrowed, potentially exposing other sensitive aspects of the agreement.

perturbation.original_text: Governing Law. This Agreement was negotiated and is being contracted ------------- for in Nevada, and shall be governed by the laws of the State of Nevada, and the United States of America, notwithstanding any conflict-of-law provision to the contrary.
perturbation.changed_text: Governing Law. This Agreement was negotiated and is being contracted ------------- for in Nevada, and shall be governed by the laws of the State of California, and the United States of America, notwithstanding any conflict-of-law provision to the contrary.
perturbation.explanation: The contract states it was negotiated in Nevada. Changing the governing law to California introduces a contradiction and raises questions about which state's laws actually apply. This could significantly impact the interpretation and enforceability of the entire agreement, as the contract was made in Nevada.

perturbation.original_text: Travel arrangements and accommodations will be provided by the COMPANY. This will be first class accommodations when available.
perturbation.changed_text: Travel arrangements and accommodations will be provided by the COMPANY. This will be accommodations when available.
perturbation.explanation: Removing 'first class' from the section regarding the accommodation leads to ambiguity and is less binding.
